overview_of_class: Brady Scholars in their senior year will meet frequently throughout the quarter to move ahead with the collaborative project they have chosen as their service to the Evanston community.
name: The Brady Scholars Program
title: WCAS PHIL 373-1-20 The Brady Scholars Program

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Brady Scholars in their senior year will meet frequently throughout the quarter to move ahead with the collaborative project they have chosen as their service to the Evanston community.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: For Brady Program students in their senior year.

descriptions.name: Learning Objectives
descriptions.value: Practical application of theories learned and discussed in the sophomore year.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Students will be evaluated on the basis of their contributions to the service project.

descriptions.name: Class Notes
descriptions.value: For Brady Program students in their senior year.
